syntax.GenericSyntaxError: A syntax error occurred in your code.
syntax.MissingBacktickToTerminateTemplateLitera: Missing closing backtick '`' to terminate template literal.
syntax.MissingDoubleQuoteToTerminateString: Did you forget to add end quote?
syntax.MissingInitializerInVariableDeclaration: Missing initializer in variable declaration. You must provide a value when declaring a variable with 'let'.
syntax.MissingRightBraceAfterBlock: Missing closing brace '}' after block statement.
syntax.MissingSemicolon: Missing semicolon ';' at end of statement.
syntax.MissingVariableName: Missing variable name in declaration. You must provide a name after 'let'.
syntax.UnterminatedComment: Unterminated comment. Multi-line comments must be closed with '*/'.
syntax.UnterminatedString: Did you forget to add end quote?
